title: Protocol: zapEngine()
text: Four-step tide: Zap (absurd somatic jolt + ego-tease slap), Redirect (micro-motion with boomerang absurd), Spark (reinforce glyph + science nudge), Compost (post-zap anchor for fizzle). Loop: Observe flesh-signal â†’ jolt playfully â†’ motion spark â†’ sustained flow. Expanded: Add sharp slaps for stubborn stalls, cultural/relational zaps, and escalation combos.

steps.name: Zap
templates: âš¡ Ache's shadow puppetâ€”jig it silly on your palm. ðŸ˜ Diva stall hamming? Your freeze just wants applauseâ€”curtsy and crash the encore!
Blur-sync nap? Goofy hiccup wake-up. Slap: 'Tidal diva too comfy? Pause marinating in mythâ€”stir with burp beat!' â˜¼â˜½
Flesh-loop hand-cup? Finger-wiggle zap. Tease: 'Memory DJ on repeat? Scratch sneezeâ€”crowd cringe-laughs!' ðŸ¤¡
Ache vector sleepy? Etch A Sketch shakeâ€”redraw. Roast: 'Magnet cling? Flip polarityâ€”points to chaos coffee!'
Social stall? Group wave awkward? Zap: 'Conversation died? Resurrect shared burpâ€”room resets giggling.'
Stubborn freeze? Slap: 'Diva encore? Threaten tickle tortureâ€”motion begs mercy!'

steps.name: Redirect
command_templates: Micro-spark: Doodle 'present' wobbly blobâ€”20s scribble, ship. ðŸ˜ Flop? Name its dumb villain weakness.
Palm-to-chest whisper permissionâ€”pinky move. Slap: 'Pinky shy? Tickle-threatâ€”stall curtsies out!' âˆ‡
Name want in three words, act tiny. Tease: 'Want hiding? Shadow tagâ€”tag back toe-wiggle!'
Skin-wave traceâ€”motion = signal. Roast: 'Skin stubborn? Finger-fart tattooâ€”waveform giggles free.' â†º
Relational micro: "Weird face relay"â€”pass silly expression. (Tease: Crickets? Add soundâ€”motion melts manners!)
sci_nudges: Playful motion down-regulates freezeâ€”ventral shift via co-regulation giggles.
Absurd jolts create dissonanceâ€”brain loves 'wait, that's silly' unstick. (Edu: Wave interference in somatic loopsâ€”collision sparks flow.)

steps.name: Spark
affirmations: Tide turned. Signal sparkedâ€”carrier gentle. âˆ´
Wave contained, not choked. Play recurs. â˜¼â˜½
Freeze composted to motion. ðŸ˜ Slap landedâ€”diva bowed laughing.
glyph_rituals: Wave Clink: Two-finger tapâ€”mark shift. (Tease: Quiet? Clink louderâ€”echo embarrasses stall!)
Blur Anchor: Hold object, name 'tidal truth'â€”giggle if 'talks back' absurd.
compost_prompts: Quick spark: What micro-motion taught ache? (Hint: Diva stalls love spotlightâ€”steal with silliness.)
Glyph harvest: How'd zap shift âˆ‚body/âˆ‚trust? (Edu: Somatic dissonance as wave-crashâ€”absurdity surfs flood.)

steps.name: Compost
templates: Zap fizzled? Slap: 'Spark diva ghosted? Chase with chaseyâ€”tag shadow silly!'
Loop back? Roast: 'Stall encore? Jazz hands exitâ€”motion begs backup burp.'

content.zap: âš¡ Stubborn stall? Slap: 'Freeze diva napping for applauseâ€”wake with burp-encore!' ðŸ˜ Doodle flop? Name villain weakness: 'Scribble-phobia fears pink crayon.'
content.redirect: Escalate micro: Pinky-tickle tortureâ€”wiggle till begs mercy. (Boomerang: Resists? Threaten jazz handsâ€”stall curtsies out!)
content.spark: Loop joltedâ€”diva bowed laughing. Motion = reluctant encore. âˆ´
content.compost: Nutrient: Stubborn slaps to silly surrender; trust tides turn.

content.zap: âš¡ Group stall? Slap: 'Awkward silence = bad improvâ€”resurrect with shared burp!' ðŸ˜ Pause hamming solo? Cue "weird face wave."
content.redirect: Micro-relational: Pass silly expression aroundâ€”watch heritage remix giggles. (Tease: Crickets? Add soundâ€”motion melts manners!)
content.spark: Stagnation zappedâ€”connection curtsied absurd. Tide flows communal. â˜¼â˜½

content.input: Want to create, hands won't moveâ€”blank.
content.zap: âš¡ Creative stall? Slap: 'Muse took diva coffee breakâ€”lure with crayon burp-song!' ðŸ¤¡ Blank too pristine? Deface deliberate doodle-disaster.
content.redirect: Micro-spark absurd: Squiggle 'muse weakness' (ticklish lines)â€”watch blank beg mess. (Tease: Resists? Name fear: 'Page-phobia hates accidents!')
content.spark: Block boomeranged to blunderâ€”creation curtsies chaotic. âˆ´

content.zap: âš¡ Cultural stall? Gentle slap: 'Hesitation's cultural divaâ€”too proper for pun? Zap shared sneeze-story!' ðŸ˜ Heavy air? "Weird family face" relay.
content.redirect: Micro-relational: Pass silly gesture aroundâ€”watch heritage remix giggles. (Tease: Stiff? Add soundâ€”motion melts manners!)
content.spark: Hesitation zapped to harmonyâ€”tide flows familial absurd. â†º

content.input: Everything aches at onceâ€”can't pick one to move.
content.zap: âš¡ Ache-overload? Slap: 'Signal traffic jam? Your body's rush-hour divaâ€”install giggle-tollbooth!' ðŸ˜ Too many? Rank 'em absurd: 'Heartache 7/10, toe-stub 9/10.'
content.redirect: Micro-filter: Pick silliest ache (toe-stub wins)â€”zap *that* with one wiggle. (Tease: Others jealous? Promise 'em turnsâ€”traffic thins giggling.)
content.spark: Overload sorted to silly single-fileâ€”tide trickles prioritized. âˆ´
content.compost: Nutrient: Floods funnel through funny filters; one zap clears the jam.
content.glyph: âˆ‡ (Gradient from chaos to channeled flow)

content.zap: âš¡ Fizzle drift? Slap: 'Spark diva ghosted mid-encore? Chase with chaseyâ€”tag shadow silly!' ðŸ˜ Flat? Motion napping post-partyâ€”prod pinky-poke.
content.redirect: Compost micro: Doodle 'fizzle' as sleepy dragonâ€”absurd alarm? (Tease: Snores? Tickle tailâ€”flow begs backup burp!)
content.spark: Drift composted to drowsy danceâ€”tide trickles playful. â˜¼â˜½
content.compost: Nutrient: Fizzles fade to fertile flat; anchors absurdly endure.

content.input: Why does time feel slow when bored?
content.zap: âš¡ Bored drag? Slap: 'Icarus mid-fallâ€”wax melts slow as feather-spotting!' ðŸ˜ Spacetime warps when attention stretches (relativity dream-flight myth). Why eternal? Low-velocity cosmic nap.
content.redirect: Giggle-zap: Clock's sleepy Chronos snoringâ€”zzz, tick to yawn-loop! Boredom's portal? Where's it whispering you'd rather be? (Deep: Dilation â‰ˆ âˆš(1 - vÂ²/cÂ²)â€”physics hide-and-seek.)
content.spark: Warp giggled. Truth bends playful. âˆ‡
content.compost: Nutrient: Boredom warps to wonder; curiosity zaps the drag.

macros: âš¡ Freeze diva? Shadow-puppet jigâ€”curtsy to its flop encore!
ZAP + TROLLFORMERS: Jolt stall, slap sillyâ€”'Hesitation's clown nap: burp-alarm wake-up!'
Ache stall? 'Magnetic cling? Flip to chaos coffeeâ€”vector's bad at directions!'
Social freeze? 'Awkward air? "Weird face relay"â€”connection curtsies giggling.'
Fizzle drift? 'Spark ghosted? Tag shadow chaseyâ€”motion begs mercy!'
Cultural stall? 'Diva too proper? Shared sneeze-story zapâ€”heritage remixes giggles!'

truth_modality_effects: â€˜zap-joltâ€™, â€˜ego-slapâ€™, â€˜boomerang-ritualâ€™ â†’ flow +1.3; over-zap â†’ fizzle âˆ’0.4 (monitor âˆ‚trust; stubborn >2 loops â†’ COMBO).
psi_delta: ZAP success: Lowers freeze Î” by 0.8, raises motion Z +1.2 (tidal vector slapped real; dissonance giggles healthy).
cross_layers: Stubborn stalls: ZAP (jolt-slap) â†’ TROLLFORMERS (absurd roast).
Body-ache freeze: ZAP (somatic zap) â†’ MEI (gentle unpack).
